title: Test
subtitle: Subtitle
citation: Kawano, Melanie. (Appendix E n. 77) "Product of the Past: An Examination of Ashanti and Dagari Proverbs as a Means of exploring the Cultural and Societal Effects of the Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade on the Dagaaba People and the Ashanti People" (1999). African Diaspora ISPs. 80.
quote: When you eat the white man’s pay, you fight at the cannon’s mouth.
